document.heading: NON-UNION EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION SYSTEM AND PAY SCHEDULE EFFECTIVE DATE AMENDMENT ACT OF 1989

history.narrative: Law 8-94 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-352, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 5, 1989, and December 19, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 11, 1990, it was assigned Act. No. 8-145 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
